---
id: create-organization-team
title: "Create organization team"
description: "Creates a new team in the organization identified by the given `orgId`. Teams allow you to manage workspace access for groups of members."

---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create organization team"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/orgs/{orgId}/teams"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new team in the organization identified by the given `orgId`. Teams allow you to manage workspace access for groups of members.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
